name: Clearly Explore (Idiom Jam - Leave No Stone Unturned)
name_original: Clearly Explore (Idiom Jam - Leave No Stone Unturned)
description:
When you enter this strange world things will seem very blurry, but as you persevere and talk to/search trash bins and boxes while avoiding dangerous spikes things will slowly start to come into focus.

This game is very short and you can expect to complete it in about 15 minutes. (Opposed to my other Game Jam game that is an endless arcade shooter)

A first person platformer/collectathon made for the Idiom Jam! Theme: Leave No Stone Unturned!
